content: This case study outlines the design and development process for an NFT marketplace application, focusing on the purchasing flow. The main goal was to create an easy and intuitive purchasing experience for users. The process involved user research, affinity mapping, and wireframe/designs creation. The MVP was successfully launched and received positive feedback from users. The study highlights the importance of focusing on simplicity, transparency, and security, and using user research and affinity mapping to identify and prioritize user needs.
